Text:
Hello, Thank you for the upload.

Can you tell me if this is in English please? Peace>
Cancel my last question, Any way I can get the narrator in English? Peace>

Demacus, if you fiddle around with your settings on either VLC, movist, or a comparable player, you should be able to set audio tracks and turn on and off subtitle tracks.  The uploader has included both Russian and English tracks so the video is in fact in English.  All you need to do is change the audiotrack manually when the movie is running in your respective movie application.
thank you uploader been missing my african home, so keen to watch this :D
